Question: HK Applied Science & Technology Research Inst. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HK Applied Science & Technology Research Inst.

Product 1

- GUIDi - AI Smart Belt: Empowers visually impaired individuals with real-time navigation using MEMS and AI technology. Features dual wide-angle cameras, edge AI module, sensor integration, haptic navigation, and voice command. Mobile app offers voice command support and over-the-air updates.

- 0.13'' Micro LED Display Module: Offers ultra-high pixel density (10000ppi) for AR/XR products. Features high brightness, long lifetime, and high efficiency of micro-LEDs.

20 startups from Hong Kong Tech Pavilion at CES 2024 demonstrate R&D strengths in AI & Data, Advanced Manufacturing, Life & Health, and Sustainability. HKSTP is fostering global startup expansion and will attend the "Talk to China" dialogue series. The pavilion is located at Hall G – 63400, Eureka Park, Venetian Expo, Las Vegas. The CES Innovation Awards at CES 2024 were received by two HKSTP Park companies: AI Guided Limited and Sitan Semiconductor International Co. Limited.

香港应用科技研究院

产品1

- GUIDi智能腰带：利用MEMS和人工智能技术，为视觉障碍人士提供实时导航功能。具备双广角摄像头、边缘人工智能模块、传感器集成、触觉导航和语音命令。移动应用提供语音命令支持和远程更新。

- 0.13英寸微LED显示模块：为增强现实/扩展现实产品提供超高像素密度（10000ppi）。具备高亮度、长寿命和微LED的高效率。

来自2024年国际消费电子展（CES）香港科技馆的20家初创企业展示了在人工智能与数据、先进制造、生命与健康以及可持续发展方面的研发优势。香港科技园正在推动全球初创企业扩展，并将参加“对话中国”系列对话活动。该馆位于拉斯维加斯威尼斯博览会Eureka Park的G馆 - 63400展位。2024年CES创新奖由两家香港科技园企业AI Guided有限公司和思坦半导体国际有限公司获得。
